NotFound.title: 404 - LOST IN THE CLOUDS
NotFound.desc: The page you are looking for has drifted away or never existed.

HomePage.subtitle: The best web hosting solution for your online success
HomePage.hero_desc: The best web hosting solution for your online success
HomePage.features_desc: We provide the enterprise-level tools and technology you need to build and scale with absolute confidence.
HomePage.feat_fast_desc: Experience unmatched speed with our NVMe SSD storage and optimized server configurations.
HomePage.feat_secure_desc: Keep your data safe with automated daily backups, free SSL certificates, and DDoS protection.
HomePage.feat_uptime_desc: Your website stays online consistently with our redundant network and tier-4 data centers.
HomePage.feat_cloud_desc: Scale your resources instantly with our flexible and distributed cloud hosting environment.
HomePage.feat_manage_desc: Control every aspect of your hosting with our custom, user-friendly control panel.
HomePage.feat_stats_desc: Monitor your website performance in real-time with our integrated analytics dashboard.

Auth.forgot_password_desc: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
Auth.check_email_desc: We've sent a password reset link to <email_tag>{email}</email_tag>. Please check your inbox.
Auth.didnt_receive_email: Didn't get the email? Try again

AboutPage.title: About Cloud Hosting
AboutPage.desc: We are a team of experts dedicated to providing high-performance hosting services that help you succeed in the digital world.
AboutPage.about_mission_desc: To provide the most reliable and affordable cloud hosting solutions for businesses of all sizes.
AboutPage.about_vision_desc: To be the global leader in cloud infrastructure, empowering innovators to build the future.

ArticlesPage.page_desc: Explore our latest articles, guides, and updates from the world of cloud hosting and technology.
ArticlesPage.newsletter_desc: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest cloud insights and special offers.
ArticlesPage.press_enter: Press Enter to start searching the cloud
